attributes.action: 'amend existing legislation to restrict the powers of the Mayor of London to vary the Congestion Charging scheme in an inequitable, unreasonable or unjust way'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The £25 charge currently proposed, with no discount for residents in the charging zones, is an inequitable, unreasonable and unjust charge.  Also, it may increase pollution to the extent that residents in the charging zones are forced (in the knowledge of an annual charge of up to almost £6,500) to sell their vehicles to rural owners with a much higher annual mileage. 

The £25 charge, if applied at all (which is opposed), should not be borne by those who purchased their vehicles without the knowledge that such a charge would be introduced and the discount for charging zone residents should be applicable.
